data.title: 'Bald-Faced Truth' with John Canzano: Former Portland Trail Blazers guard Steve Blake (audio)
data.meta_description: Steve Blake talks about how the lockout-shortened season went for the L.A. Lakers. He also offers his opinions on the Western Conference finals.
data.text:
Steve Blake joined

on the

radio show on Monday on

.

Blake and Canzano talked about Blake's summer basketball camp and the effort he puts into running the camp.

Blake talked about how the lockout-shortened season went for the L.A. Lakers. Steve broke down the Western Conference finals between the Oklahoma City Thunder and the San Antonio Spurs.

Blake left the Blazers to play for the Lakers. Blake talks about what it's like to play alongside future hall-of-famer Kobe Bryant.

Blake keeps a residence in Portland and talks about the city and why it became a place for he and his family to plant roots.

Blake also discussed the current players on the Blazers roster, including Nicolas Batum. Steve and John discuss areas of improvement in Steve's game and how he'll work on those improvements during the offseason.

Blake and Canzano discuss whether Brandon Roy will play in the NBA again.
